page.title: Execute command
page.description: For commands that have not been included in the client API, the execute command can be used.

section.description: For a full list of commands that redis supports see the redis site *[http://redis.io/commands]* .
section.example:
dim redis as extension::RedisClient = extension::RedisClient::CreateClient() dim info as extension::RedisResult
info = redis.Execute("info") ? filter_string(info.valueString,"version") = "redis_version:3.0.501"
